result.title: Shortest path using BFS question ?
result.content: I am solving a question where I want to find the shortest path from a source to destination in a 2D unweighted graph picking up all the coins given. So, each vertex can be visited more than once. How do I solve it using BFS (or is there any better way to solve it) ? I'm unable to get my head around how to track back on the visited cells. Please help me . Thanks !
